Home.About: @:Common.AppName is a tool that enables the use of tool modules to help with Plex Server management.
Home.Name: Home
Home.Title: Welcome to @:Common.AppName

Language.Description: @:Common.Language.Name allows you to change language of the app
Language.Name: Language

ET.Description: @:Modules.ET.Name allows you to export some information about the medias in your libraries
ET.Name: ExportTool
ET.LevelInfo: Export level determines what data is going to be exported.
ET.TT-ETType: Here you select the type of library you want to export
ET.TT-ETLibrary: Here you select library you want to export
ET.TT-ETLevel: Here you select the values you want to export

Status.GetSectionItems: Initial fetching items of {idx} in chuncks of {chunck}
Status.Processing-Chunk-Detailed:
Processing chunk {current} of {total}.
Items to export: {urlStr}

Settings.Description: Here you can define the settings for @:Modules.ET.Name
Settings.ArraySep: Delimiter, with multiple info in same field
Settings.ColumnSep: Delimiter between fields in CSV file
Settings.TimeOut: Timeout when requesting info from PMS in sec
Settings.OrgTitleNull: Default Original Title to title, if empty
Settings.SortTitleNull: Default Sort title to title, if empty

About.Name: About us and credits
About.Devdane22: Tommy (aka dane22), a Plex community member (ukdtom on GitHub)
About.DevCPSO: Casper (aka CPSO), a soon to be Plex community member (CPSO on GitHub)
About.TranslationBetaTestersText: A huge thanks goes out to all the people who helped in translating and testing @:Common.AppName
About.PlexPoCredits: And many thanks to the authors/developers and staff at Plex. We are eternally grateful for your dedication, talent and hard work And our friends at POEditor.com, who provided a free translation site because we are an Open-Source project.
